title: Automated Audit Evidence Collection
description: An analyst must configure a GRC tool to automatically collect evidence for a compliance audit.

tasks.description: Map a specific compliance control (e.g., 'Antivirus is installed on all workstations') to a data source (e.g., the EDR tool).
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst correctly maps the control to the technical data source.

tasks.description: Configure an API connector in the GRC tool to query the EDR tool's API on a daily basis.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst successfully configures the API integration.

tasks.description: Set up a rule to automatically assess compliance based on the API data (e.g., if EDR agent is present, control is 'Compliant').
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst successfully automates the evidence collection and control testing process.
